# <a name="keyboard-shortcuts-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="908c8-102">Outlook.com 中的键盘快捷方式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="908c8-102">Keyboard shortcuts in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="908c8-103">在 Outlook.com 中, 您可以使用与用于使用的电子邮件服务相同的键盘快捷方式, 例如 Gmail、Yahoo Mail 或 Outlook.com。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="908c8-103">In Outlook.com you can use the same keyboard shortcuts as the email service you're used to working with, such as Gmail, Yahoo Mail, or Outlook.com.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="908c8-104">转到 "[辅助功能设置](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840)" (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="908c8-104">Go to [Accessibility settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="908c8-105">**Settings**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="908c8-105">**Settings**</span></span> 
 > <span data-ttu-id="908c8-106">**查看所有 Outlook 设置** > **常规** > **辅助功能**) 并选择您想要使用的键盘快捷方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="908c8-106">**View all Outlook settings** > **General** > **Accessibility**) and choose which keyboard shortcuts you'd like use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="908c8-107">若要查看键盘快捷方式的完整列表, 请参阅[Outlook.com 键盘快捷方式](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="908c8-107">To see the full list of keyboard shortcuts, see [Outlook.com keyboard shortcuts](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
